name: Bentonite Clay "Papa" Bar
description:
The Papa Bar draws influence from my very own Papa Keane and his aftershave ritual. 

This bar produces a rich, creamy lather and is lightly scented with clove oil, a naturally warming anti-bacterial and anti-inflammatory agent.

Bentonite Clay is derived from deposits of weathered volcanic ash. This natural ingredient allows your skin to retain moisture and heal quickly after shaving, while reducing red bumps, itching and razor burn.

Made with Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Castor Oil, Bentonite Clay, Clove Essential Oil.

name: Bentonite Clay Shave Bar
description:
This shaving bar produces a rich, creamy lather and is lightly scented with peppermint oil, leaving your skin feeling smooth and refreshed. 

Bentonite Clay is derived from deposits of weathered volcanic ash. This natural ingredient allows your skin to retain moisture and heal quickly after shaving, while reducing red bumps, itching and razor burn.

Made with Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Distilled Water, Sodium Hydroxide, Castor Oil, Bentonite Clay, Essential Oil.

name: Grapefruit Rosemary Moisture Bar
description:
This invigorating scent combination helps to lift your mood and revive the mind. Super-moisturizing and nourishing everyday soap for hands, face and body. Shea butter acts as a natural healing agent and restores elasticity to the skin.

Made with coconut oil, olive oil, distilled water, shea butter, sodium hydroxide, and essential oils.
